Summary: On the beach about 90 feet over our heads -taller than house shorter than hotel.
divs: sighting detailsi just learned of your website from (http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=4mmpcafbdjk). we reported this to nasa, the white house, and some other ufo tracking website. we saw a light on 09\19\09 at about 8:30 (or closer to quarter 'til nine) while on vacation in dewey beach, de. my husband and i took our two kids and dog to the beach at night because the children had never been on the beach at night time and dogs were now allowed. i decided to take the dog back to the house. i turned to look back at my family (they were about 80 feet away)when i noticed a brightly lit, silent object directly above and just to the right of them. i ran back thinking that it was a helicopter search light and that they would be hurt by blowing sand. wrong. thant was just the mind trying to rationalize. this object was extremely low. lower than a hotel but higher than a house. i yelled ���look up!��� and that���s when they saw it. i suppose they didn���t notice it because it seems like the light made a fog (the fog ���made��� a cloud at the bottom that was so dense that the light didn���t touch the ground) -but the light was on the water. the bright circular object & the associated fog jerked to the left and now it was directly above their heads above their heads; so i ran back to them and we stood there in shock. not a sound. the dog didn���t even seem to care. we too were not afraid, but felt curious. i can't tell if it was a craft or if the light was coming from a hole like a dimension if that makes sense. this is the strange part....my family saw a light with nothing fancy about it... me, the light was perfectly white and circular with a dark center and a dark line going from the center to the right edge of the circle. i kept sawing, why is it dark in the middle like that and they said it wasn't. i pointed to exactly what i was talking about and they saw something different. it felt like i was showing them a sapphire bracelet and they were seeing rubies. our experience was less than a minute. the light just vanished or went out(silly me for blinking or perhaps it was my angle under the fog-cloud.) but my husband and one daughter stated that the light did go out but then in about one second it had shot itself from right above our heads straight up. we totally expected to see this in the newspaper since a small plane was in the area (within a mile or two) and passed right behind it. a few weeks later i was youtubing some terms and came across a news program that was discussing it. of course the news program didn't mention delaware so i thought i would let you know in case you documented this even. this is exactly what we saw: http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=zqustezhy3g if you go to the site below, you will see that so many saw this at the exact same time across the us and canada not just the east coast on september 19, 2009 (like a code huh?) they all appeared at the same time, for the same duration and they all jerked in a direction before vanishing. none of the 200 or so witnesses claimed to have felt any fear just curiosity... that's interesting. http:\\www.ufoworldnews.com\2009\09\19\bright-light-in-the-sky-emanating-an-intense-cone-shaped-light-and-trailing-smoke-or-fog\comment-page-1\#comment-2145 i'll attach a photo in a bit michelle pasta
trends: There have been no other sightings in Dewey Beach
This sighting has never been favorited.
